character_cards.name: Father Marryman
character_cards.effect:
Take 1 Student from this card and place it on an Island of your choice.
Then, draw a new Student from the Bag and place it on this card

character_cards.name: Mr. Greedy
character_cards.effect:
During this turn, you take control of any number of Professors even if you have
the same number of Students as the player who currently controls them

character_cards.name: Sir Sirius Gold
character_cards.effect:
Choose an Island and resolve the Island as if Mother Nature had ended her movement there.
Mother Nature will still move and the Island where she ends her movement will also be resolved

character_cards.name: AZ
character_cards.effect: You may move Mother Nature up to 2 additional Islands than is indicated by the Assistant card you've played

character_cards.name: Donna Herbira
character_cards.effect:
Place a No Entry tile on an Island of your choice. The first time Mother Nature ends her movement there,
put the No Entry tile back onto this card DO NOT calculate influence on that Island, or place any Towers

character_cards.name: Messire Bojack
character_cards.effect: When resolving a Conquering on an Island, Towers do not count towards influence

character_cards.name: Harley Dean
character_cards.effect: You may take up to 3 Students from this card and replace them with the same number of Students from your Entrance

character_cards.name: Sir Ferrante
character_cards.effect: During the influence calculation this turn, you count as having 2 more influence

character_cards.name: Cavalier Bartolomeo Dueleoni
character_cards.effect: Choose a color of Student: during the influence calculation this turn, that color adds no influence

character_cards.name: Minstrel Folcorelli
character_cards.effect: You may exchange up to 2 Students between your Entrance and your Dining Room.

character_cards.name: Miss Caball√©
character_cards.effect:
Take 1 Student from this card and place it in your Dining Room.
Then, draw a new Student from the Bag and place it on this card.

character_cards.name: Witch Hazel
character_cards.effect:
Choose a type of Student: every player (including yourself) must return 3 Students of that type from their Dining Room to the bag.
If any player has fewer than 3 Students of that type, return as many Students as they have.
